node.display_long_description:
Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before. Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR kart racing game equipped with immersive full-hand driving and weapon controls.

Lose yourself in hundreds of hours of gameplay. Including a fascinating story mode, exhilarating online tournaments, more than a trillion customization combinations, and hundreds of achievements for the trophy hunters out there! 

Features:   
Cross Buy
All original tracks
Career mode with over 200 missions
Cross play with SteamVR, PSVR, Rift & Quest
Casual & Hardcore racing modes
Meme, stickers, voice chat & dance moves
Customizable outfit down to the rim of your car
Regular online tournaments
Motion sickness prevention options & onboarding class for new VR racer
300+ Quests & achievements
Cloud save

Coming soon:   
Graphic upgrade for Oculus Rift S & Quest 2
Multiplayer increase to 8 players
Content update: New Tracks, Weapons, Tournaments, Reverse tracks

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Patch 2.2.1 Release Notes
[Bug fix]
- Enable Seasonal Event in server.
- Fix Crash in Seasonal Event Dashboy link in garage.
- Fix disappearing player body in Lobby scene.
- Track Factory 51 (Beta) Improve lighting for Quest.
- Track Factory 51 (Beta) Improve laser beam for Rift.
- Added blinking eyes in character creation screen.
- Fix Event Leaderboard reporting wrong progress.

nodes.title: First tournament of this Racing season is LIVE (Dec-Feb 2021)
nodes.body_text:
Challenge yourself during this winter in FROSTY SEASON ‚òÉÔ∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è

Complete 30 new challenges throughout this season with 3 competitive events. üèéüí¶

Your chance to unlock all-new 26 limited exclusive items during this season ONLY!



The first tournament of Season 1 is here.
And it will be IMMERSIVE !



Now it‚Äôs your chance to improve your immersive driving skills with new 10 immersive quests to complete.  üí™

Immersive Festa event starts TODAY until  12th January 2021 (11.59 pm PDT)

Here are 10 new challenging quests to complete:

- Victory Hunting I/II/III/IV -  Top 90/70/30/10% on Seasonal Leaderboard.
- The Showdown - Win 3 race while playing using the Immersive control.
- Triple Xtreme -  Place top 3 in extreme track while using super immersive control 3 times (any track)
- Nitro Dash - Nitro 10 times in a single race while using super immersive control.
- The Survivor - Wipe egg, dino carbo, and carbo cracker off-screen while using super immersive control.
- Dash Store - Consume all Dash Products in a single race while using super immersive control (Bar, Bull, and Max).
- Shoot and Drive - Hit 3 racers with a single Terminator Jr. while using super immersive control.



View the Tournament trailer on Youtube here. And as always, there is a Redeem code hidden in our video ;)

node.reviewDescription:
I am not used to make reviews and i only wrotte a few during the past years but here i am.

I played a lot of different VR games such as Moss, Alyx, PopOne, Phasmophobia, Echo Arena, Walking dead & many other famous titles etc... 

However, i already played this game more than all the other games. Let me explain.

This game can and will be improved. However, it has everything you need to enjoy playing VR comfortably installed in your chair.

I am not a big lazy guy but i also know that VR sessions can be very tiring so the gametime is physicaly limited. However with this game you can play comfortably sitted and remains fully immersive. In fact it is more immersive to be sitted.

There are many cosmectics, weapons and they recently improved graphics & performance with two new tracks.

Frequent updates, solid base & great ambitions such as becoming the VR kart game reference.

This game is not perfect but it has EVERYTHING you need to enjoy playing VR while drifting, shotting, throwing things... 

Drift is the Key by the way. ;)

Conclusion: JUST BUY IT

A few things that needs to be improved in my opinion:
-lobby interaction is broken (Other's people moves looks weird)
-Engines needs to be balanced in order to handle harder Track such as Volcanic Jungle and even more to be able to drift on all the maps.
-Poison/Hack needs to be reduce because it can break a perfect run & let you loose even if you were ahead from far.  It is a great Weap btw but too powerfull in my opinion.
-Need to be much much more known by VR community ;)
node.reviewTitle: From a Guy Who never writte reviews.

developerResponse.body:
Thank you so much for the thorough review!

We are constantly improving things and some of that is already in our pipeline such as the movement of the character.

In classic mode, most engines should work well on most tracks with minimal braking requires. This change drastically in the Pro racing mode and everything becomes crazy. You will need to master every corner with a drift and brake combination. We still discuss this internally if we have gone too far on the difficulty of the game.

We already changed the drop rate of the Hacker recently but we could consider to nerfing it too.

And we definitely agree on your last point ;)

website_page_meta.description:
Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before... Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR racing game with full hand driving and weapons controls.

Over 100 hours of gameplay contents including story mode, regular online tournaments, 100s of achievements and over 1,000,000,000,000 customizable parts.
